ISSUE.TITLE: Validation of the "Maximum shopping cart items" setting on existing cart
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.30 beta Steps to reproduce the problem: 1) Add more than one item in cart 2) Go to /Admin/Setting/ShoppingCart. And change the "Maximum shopping cart items" value to 1 3) System doesn't allow to add new items to the cart. But it allows to checkout and place the order It should not allow me to to do check out and place order respect with this setting. So we should validate the shopping cart setting on the existing shopping cart as well

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Remove inappropriate environment variables from web.config
